name: The Starry Skies Their Flowers Rain
title: "The Starry Skies Their Flowers Rain" Nilou
desc: Seven heavens, passing like a radiant stream, as though a dream drawn into being.
in_play_description: When there is Nilou on the field who has this card equipped, the DMG dealt by your Bountiful Core is increased by 1.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Nilou to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: Combat Action: When your active character is Nilou, equip this card. After Nilou equips this card, immediately use Dance of Haftkarsvar. When there is Nilou on the field who has this card equipped, the damage dealt by your Bountiful Core is increased by 1. (You must have Nilou in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
